topics.topic_description: I am looking for stories about Iranian female athletes who seek asylum in other countries.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that identify female athletes who refused to return to Iran after competition and slam government by seeking asylum from other countries. Relevant documents must identify the athlete by name, and spell out the reason for seeking asylum and if they joined Refugee Team in Olympic competition. "Official" or unofficial reasons are equally acceptable, as long as the document gives some reason that the athlete refused to return after the competition,name of the countries that accepted their request, and Iran government reaction.

topics.topic_description: I'm looking for articles detailing how climate change is affecting Russia whether environmentally, economically, human health or national security.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that detail how climate change would impact Russia in various realms. Relevant documents should detail areas affected by fires or flooding directly attributed to climate change, warmer winters, how potential ice cap melting would impact the coastal areas, including northern bases. Other details - how Russia views how climate change could affect the global political arena and national security, to include domestic unrest. Also, articles on how human health is affected and increased deaths, how towns built on permafrost are affected should be included. Lastly, also included is an article that claims Russia could become an economic world leader due to climate change. Articles discussing whether Russia plans to combat climate change or not are not included, although that would be another interesting angle to pursue. Also not included are articles about international events, efforts, or impacts, even if Russia is part of such activity such as UN discussions, as well as articles about how Russia is a greenhouse contributor.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for stories about the people who were brought to criminal justice in the melamine scandal in China.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that identify people who were brought to criminal justice in the melamine scandal in China. Relevant documents must identify the people by name and title, or titles with organization name, and spell out the punishment. Those who were punished but not on criminal charges are not relevant unless they were found guilty of criminal conduct in the scandal later.

topics.topic_title: Corruption during construction of Vostochny Cosmodrome
topics.topic_description: I am looking for reports on officials convicted of corruption in the construction of the Russian Space launch Complex at Vostochny in the Far East.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles on corruption and conviction of Russian officials and businessmen involved in the construction of the Russian Space launch Complex in Vostochny in the Far East. Relevant articles are to include information on Individuals, their duties, the crimes they are accused of, and plans by Roscosmos to alleviate the damage they did to the project. Issues not attributed to corruption are not relevant.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for reports on whether the star Betelgeuse going supernova will present a threat to the Earth.
topics.topic_narrative: Find reports on whether the star Betelgeuse going supernova will present a threat to the Earth. The red-giant star went through some dramatic changes in brightness at the end of 2019 before returning to its "normal" magnitude in 2020. Do not collect information on supernovae or stellar evolution in general. Only information specifically detailing the dangers from radiation and dust that Betelgeuse exploding would present to the Earth are required.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for information on large, sudden, and dramatic increases in butterfly populations in Europe, including the Caucasus.
topics.topic_narrative: Find information on sudden and dramatic increases in butterfly populations in Europe. These increases should be sudden, unexpected, and very dramatic, with butterfly numbers in the thousands or more. This information can include judgements on the possible effects of the large number of insects and their eventual larvae on agriculture. Information on large numbers of caterpillars and insect pests in general, and reports from outside of Europe or European Russia and the Caucasus is not relevant.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for information on taking bicycles on local or long-distance trains.
topics.topic_narrative: Find information on taking bicycles on trains, both local and long-distance. Required are references to bicycles being welcomed on public transport or long-distance trains and the popularity of bicycles on board, the setting aside of special sections of train cars for them. Information on accidents involving bicycles and new developments in their construction, electric power for them, is not required.

topics.topic_title: Media report in China on Biden's election of the president
topics.topic_description: I am looking for stories in media of China on Joe Biden's triumphs in the presidential election of the United States.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that identify media reports in China on Joe Biden's election of the Presidential of the United States. Relevant documents must identify the media by name and include a coverage of the fact and/or comment. The articles from Chinese media of foreign countries, whether in China or not in China, like those of foreign embassies in China, are not considered relevant, unless they cited any report from media of China that would identify the source by the official name of the media. Articles from media of Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau, in this case, are not considered relevant.

topics.topic_title: The effect of pandemic online learning on children
topics.topic_description: Did online learning during the COVID-19 pandemic result in an increase of depression among elementary school children?
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles about virtual learning during the COVID-19 pandemic causing increased depression among elementary school children. Articles solely about teenagers and about depression caused by quarantine conditions are not relevant. Articles describing the effects of using different technologies to access online learning, such as mobile telephones, tablets, and computers are relevant as long as they relate to online learning during the pandemic. There must be a stated link from the use of these devices during the pandemic to increased depression among elementary school children.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for articles about how the sanctions placed on Russia have impacted the agricultural sector.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that give specific information that include figures and type of agriculture in Russia that have been affected by sanctions. Most articles claim that the agricultural sector has benefited since imports are no longer allowed. Included articles on government subsidies that were placed to support agriculture to counterbalance sanctions, some indicate they are no longer needed and claim that Russia now exports grain rather than imports. Did not include articles on sanctions themselves, or those with vague claims that agriculture benefited from the sanctions without giving numbers or examples. Did not include mentions of agriculture development in the occupied areas of Ukraine. Excluded other news about agriculture in Russia. Did not include Russias retaliatory sanctions against EU agriculture.

topics.topic_title: China's attitudes toward the U.S. withdrawal from the Paris Climate Accords
topics.topic_description: I am looking for report on China's official attitudes toward the U.S. withdrawal from the Paris Climate Accords.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that report on China's official attitudes toward the U.S. withdrawal from the Paris Climate Accords. Relevant documents must identify specific official source of the information. The content should mention directly China's official attitudes toward the issue. Official here means that the source of information should come from Chinese government agencies, or China's think tanks, whether the articles are published in and by the media of China or not.

topics.topic_description: I'm looking for articles about how Chinas economy could withstand the coronavirus COVID-19 pandemic.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that provide assessments on whether China's economy will be able to withstand the pressures of the coronavirus pandemic. Some assessments claim that China will not only come out stronger, but perhaps dominate the global market. Others forecast that China will stumble given that their economic growth has already slowed. Information on how a pandemic induced recession could negatively the power structure was also included. Predictions that China would come out stronger because of their strict measures were also included even if the article did not specifically mention the economy and steps China has taken to bolster its economy. What may be difficult ascertain is whether the impact to China's economy is global competition or the virus, so if the story included the coronavirus as a catalyst to economic conflict, then I included it. However, any news on China's economy that is more about its conflict with the US, or other countries was not included.

topics.topic_title: Intellectual property disputes Tesla encountered in China
topics.topic_description: I am looking for stories about intellectual property disputes Tesla encountered in China.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that identify intellectual property disputes that Tesla encountered in China. Relevant documents must identify specific types of disputes (patent, trademark, etc.) that Tesla was involved in. Cases in which Tesla was claimant or defendant are all relevant, whether resolved, settled or not. Other disputes are not considered relevant.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for articles on the dramatic decrease in the number of bees and beehives.
topics.topic_narrative: Find information on the dramatic decrease in the numbers of bees and beehives throughout the world. This world-wide phenomenon is of vital interest to agriculture specialists. Information on the decline of the populations of other insects is not required as bees make up the vast majority of insect pollinators.

topics.topic_title: The impact of Chengdu Research Base of Giant Panda Breeding on local tourism
topics.topic_description: I am looking for stories about the impact of the Chengdu Research Base of Giant Panda Breeding on local tourism.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that tell the impact of the Chengdu Research Base of Giant Panda Breeding on local tourism. Relevant documents must specify that there is direct link between the Research Base and local tourism in Chengdu, i.e., the tourism activities and spending that are directly related to the work of the Research Base. Articles about the research work and other activities with no mentioning of tourism are not considered relevant.

topics.topic_title: The situation of myopia rate among K12 students in China
topics.topic_description: I am interested in finding information about the situation of myopia among K12 students in China.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles carry information about the situation of myopia rate among K12 students in China. Relevant documents should include information about the current situation and/or changes of the myopia rate, factors that affect the eyesight of K12 students, and the trend. Articles about the prevention and treatment of myopia, the research in the area of vision health, are not considered relevant.

topics.topic_title: Cases of formaldehyde related pollution in household products
topics.topic_description: I am interested in finding information about cases of formaldehyde related pollution in household products in China.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles carry information about cases of formaldehyde related pollution in household products in China. Relevant articles should mention specific events that involve the pollution with information about the harms resulted in. Articles that discuss about the pollution of excessive formaldehyde, the harms and remedies, without mentioning any specific cases, are not considered relevant. Articles that discuss other types of pollutions found in household products are not considered relevant.

topics.topic_title: Are AIDS patients discriminated against in China
topics.topic_description: I am interested in finding out if AIDS patients are discriminated against in China.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that carry information about whether AIDS patients in China face any discrimination in the country. Relevant articles would be those that provide information about the situation in China from the following perspectives: discussions about discriminations that are found to exist, cases of discriminations and efforts to eliminate discriminations. Articles that discuss about AIDS and AIDS patients from the perspectives of medicine and public health including treatment are not relevant. Articles about discriminations that AIDS patients face in other countries are not relevant.

topics.topic_title: Sanctions on export of titanium from Russia to U.S.
topics.topic_description: I am looking for information on sanctions-related issues concerning the export of titanium from Russia to the U.S.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles on sanctions-related threats to the export of titanium from Russia to the U.S. Information on Boeing and its relationship with the Russian firm VSMPO-AVISMA. Find information on whether either side will cut off this relationship. Not required are articles on Russian titanium exports to other countries and developments in the Ukrainian titanium industry.

topics.topic_title: COVID vaccinations for children in Russia
topics.topic_description: I am looking for information on COVID vaccinations for children in Russia.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles on COVID vaccination for children in Russia. Include articles on vaccination during or before intended pregnancies as well. Find articles on "antivaxers" only to the extent that this applies explicitly to child vaccinations. Do not find articles on childhood vaccinations for other diseases or on child vaccination in other countries.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for articles concerning the black hole in the center of the galaxy M87.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles on the black hole located at the center of the galaxy M87. These articles may concern physical characteristics of the black hole, its size, mass, its effect on the surrounding space, and the jet which may be shooting out from it. Information may also include the recently acquired images of the accretion disk around the black hole. Information on other black holes, including the one at the center of the Milky Way, is not required.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for articles on the growth of wind energy in Russia.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles on the development and growth of wind energy in Russia. Include information on joint ventures with foreign firms for the production of wind turbines and related equipment. Include information on the planned outputs of windmill parks. Information on wind energy in other countries not involving cooperation with Russian entities is not required. Neither is information on other renewable or non-renewable energy resources in Russia.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for articles that reflect Russia's attitude towards Ukrainian Presidential Candidate Volodymyr Zelenskiy.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that reveal the Russian perspective of then presidential candidate Volodymyr Zelenskiy for the 2019 election. Include articles that highlight what Ukrainian officials say that Russian media circulates about Zelenskiy as that reveals what Russians want readers to be aware of. Russian perspective as to his ability to win, who might be supporting him, how seriously they should be taking him, and so forth. Did not include articles that discussed subsequent elections, local or parliamentary elections, or any actions Zelenskiy took once he became president. Did not include Zelenskiys recommendations on how elections in Donbass should be run. Articles purely about the polls and statistics were not included.

topics.topic_title: What species are endangered in the Yangtze due to pollution
topics.topic_description: I am interested in finding out which species are endangered due to the water pollution in the Yangtze River and the river basin.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that have information about any species in the Yangtze River and river basin that are endangered due to water pollution of Yangtze River. Relevant articles should identity the specific names of the species, and specify that they are endangered as a result of water pollution in Yangtze River. Articles that discuss the impact of water pollution in Yangtze River on the eco system in general without mentioning any specific species that are endangered because of the pollution are not relevant. The endangeredness resulted by other factors, like illegal hunting, or climate change, are not relevant.

topics.topic_description: Looking for articles detailing evidence in order identify the 2.5 thousand year old mummy known as the Ukok Princess.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that give evidence of the identity of the 2,500 year old mummy known as the Ukok Princess. Find details that include appearance, what was buried with her, social standing, tattoos that could reveal what her role was, theories that make her a princess, shaman or a warrior. Did not include information on exhibits of the mummy, nor how the people in the region view her from a spiritual perspective. Did not include articles on grave robbing, or superstitions that claim she protects the local people from the coronavirus.

topics.topic_description: I am interested in finding information about the construction of sponge city projects in China.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles about any construction projects of sponge city in China. Relevant articles should identify specific cities where the sponge projects are being constructed or are completed. Articles about the plans of sponge city projects in specific cities or nationwide are not relevant. Technical articles that discuss sponge cities are not relevant unless they would refer to specific projects that are being constructed or completed. Articles about some projects that may be part of the sponge city project in a city are not relevant. Only articles about entire sponge city projects are of interest in this information search.)

topics.topic_description: I seek articles that explain how the refugee crisis could be dividing Europe.
topics.topic_narrative: Look for articles that explain why refugees seeking asylum in Europe could be dividing the EU. Articles that discuss the economic impact of refugees, how the economic situation in different EU countries could determine how the citizens receive refugees, whether the country of origin is a factor. Whether various EU states are willing or not to allow Brussels to decide refugee policy. Do not include articles that mention terrorism from refugees in the EU without discussing how that impacts the refugee policy. Vague articles should not be included. Also, do not include articles about individual countries and their parties that are using the refugee crisis as a domestic political platform. Reports of refugee numbers in various EU countries should not be reported.

topics.topic_title: Use of Teflon as potential health risk
topics.topic_description: I am looking for articles of Teflon use that may pose potential health risks.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles referencing Teflon as potential health risk. Relevant documents must give a reason or explain why the use of Teflon is a concern. The application of Teflon can be of any means, as long as the health risk is affecting human.

topics.topic_title: The effects of climate change on Iran's current weather
topics.topic_description: How has climate change affected Iran's current weather patterns?
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that describe the effect of climate change on Iran's current weather patterns. Documents that describe an increase in temperature, the effect of greenhouse gases on Irans weather, droughts, floods, and changes in weather patterns in Iran are acceptable. Documents must focus on Iran as a whole, not on specific provinces of Iran. Articles about the effect of climate change on the health of humans, including Iran's population, are not relevant. Reports of conferences or seminars on the topic of climate change are not relevant. Documents that focus on Iran's agriculture are not relevant. Documents that mention the effect of climate change on Iran, but have a different focus (such as creating a green economy, or Irans aquatic ecosystem) are not relevant. Documents that describe reasons for climate change, propose solutions on how to slow the advance of climate change, or predict the future effects of climate change on Iran's weather, are not relevant.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for information on shamanism in Siberia.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles on shamanism in Siberia. Because shamanism is found throughout the world in one form or another, I am only interested in those articles which concern shamanism as practices either in Siberia or by peoples of Siberian origin within the Russian Federation. Information on shamanistic beliefs and practices, as well as political activities of shamans is required. Articles on shamanism practiced in Europe or the U.S., as well as by other native peoples in South America, are not relevant.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for information on the on-going drought in the southwestern United States.
topics.topic_narrative: Find information on the on-going drought in the southwestern United States. The information should be on the present situation in the region, and can contain references to the historical severity of the drought and its economic and social consequences. Not required is information on forest fires in the U.S. and elsewhere, unless they are specifically tied to the drought, and on droughts in other parts of the world. Future warnings and predictions of droughts are also not required.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for articles on the size of the Siberian tiger population.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles on the present size of the population of Siberian tigers. This may include reports on tiger populations in various parts of the Russian Far East and in the Peoples Republic of China. Reports on individual tigers, poaching, incidents involving humans, as well as information on events, conferences, and meetings concerning tigers is only required if the size of the tiger population is explicitly mentioned.

topics.topic_description: Looking for articles on why the Arctic is warming faster than other regions of Earth.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that explain why the Arctic is warming faster than other places on Earth. Articles should include scientific details, data, and other tangible factors. Examples of how the air circulates over the pole and how it impacts other aspects of the globe can be included. While I primarily included the data from Russia, much of it was drawn from studies done in other countries, including the US. Any data that shows how Russia, especially its northern or Siberian regions, is affected should be included. Articles that are solely about daily weather forecasts, or storm warnings should not be included. However, annual predictions of heat waves or cold spells based on long term studies may be included. Do not include general climate change or such information for other regions of the world.

topics.topic_title: The impact of the trade war between the US and China on China's export to the US
topics.topic_description: I am interested in finding out the impact of the trade war between the US and China on China's export to the US.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles about the impact of the trade war between the US and China on China's export to the U.S. Relevant articles should describe the impact that already took place and is directly related to the trade war between the two countries. Articles that discuss about the trade war itself without mentioning the actual impact on China's export to the U.S., and articles that analyze the policies and economies of the two countries and project the impact on China's export to the U.S. are not relevant.

topics.topic_title: The connection between the extraction of bitcoin cryptocurrencies by the Chinese and power outages in Iran
topics.topic_description: I am looking for the connection between bitcoin mining by the Chinese and power outages in Iran.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles on the connection between the Chinese extraction of bitcoin cryptocurrencies and the unexpected power outage in many cities in Iran. Were the Chinese allowed to mine bitcoins? In which cities were they based? Why was Iran chosen? Was bitcoin mining legal in Iran? If not, why did the Iranian government not expel the Chinese offenders?

topics.topic_description: I am looking for articles on the most effective ways to lose weight.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles which describe effective ways for weight loss, including information on diet, exercise, and medication, as well as descriptions on their effectiveness. This does not include simple mentions of weight loss fads without any description of effectiveness.

topics.topic_title: Iranian soccer national team victory since 2016
topics.topic_description: I am looking for the number of winners and victories for Iranian soccer national team over the years internationally since 2016.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles about the performance of Iranian soccer team players and the number of team victories internationally since 2016. Documents about individual althetes as well as retrospective articles that discuss winning or losing streaks over the time period from 2016 to 2021 are considered relevant.

topics.topic_title: Improving living conditions in the Russian Arctic
topics.topic_description: I am looking for information plans for improving living conditions in the Russian Arctic.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles dealing with plans to improve living conditions for the human populations of the Russian Arctic. Articles may deal with individual regions as long as they border on the Arctic Ocean. News on Russian cooperation with other countries on developing human infrastructure in the Arctic is also desirable. Articles on general development of living conditions throughout Russia and development of purely military infrastructure in the Arctic are not required.

topics.topic_title: Meghan Markle's accusations of racism in Oprah Winfrey interview
topics.topic_description: Meghan Markle accuses British royal family of racism in interview with Oprah Winfrey.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that report that Meghan Markle accused the British royal family of racism during an interview she and Prince Harry had with Oprah Winfrey. Documents that mention Markle's accusations but are not specifically about the interview with Oprah Winfrey are not relevant. For example, articles about racism in the UK, or reactions by the governments of New Zealand and Australia to this interview, are not relevant. Articles about the interview that only discuss the accusation that the British royal family is lying are not relevant.

topics.topic_title: The impact of the Three Gorges Project on Yangtze River ecosystem and relevant monitoring
topics.topic_description: I am interested in finding articles about the impact of the Three Gorges Project on Yangtze River ecosystem and what relevant monitoring measures are in place.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that address the impact of the Three Gorges Project on Yangtze River ecosystem and what relevant measures are in place to monitor the impact and changes that the project brings. Find articles that specifically cover ecosystem issues. Other issues, like power generation, immigration, etc., are not a target of the search. Articles on the potential impact and studies on appropriate measures to be taken are not considered relevant.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for articles that describe opposition leader Aleksey Navalny's 2018 attempt at running for president and any associated strategy.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that describe Navalny's attempt to enter the 2018 presidential elections, to include any positive or negative outcomes. Look for where he opened offices, how he collected donations, with whom he cooperated or not (Sobchak), how he used YouTube, or his outreach to small towns. Report on how he attempted to go through the legal process when his candidacy was denied. Also, include his political philosophical influences. The Kremlin's machinations at keeping Navalny from running are not to be included. The actual presidential elections should not be included.

topics.topic_title: The number of Chinese sturgeon in Yangtze River
topics.topic_description: I am interested in finding articles that give the number of Chinese sturgeon in Yangtze River.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that provide information about the number of Chinese sturgeons in the Yangtze River. Relevant articles should mention specific number of the species. Articles that cover other aspects of the species, like techniques of farm raising, factors that affect the number of the fish, the significance of the preservation of the species, are not considered relevant.

topics.topic_title: Tourism in Beijing under the Covid-19 pandemic
topics.topic_description: I am interested in finding information about the tourism industry in Beijing amid the Covid-19 pandemic.
topics.topic_narrative: Find stories about the situation of the tourism industry in Beijing under the Covid-19 pandemic. Relevant articles are those that would cover any aspect of the industry in the city, like the situation of museums and other attractions, restaurants, tour operators, etc. during the time when the pandemic remained a concern. Stories about outbound travel from Beijing would not be considered relevant. Only the actual situations would be of interest for the information search. Articles of analysis of the industry and projections, unless they do mention the actual situation, would not be considered relevant.

topics.topic_title: Tengrism in Central Asia and Mongolia
topics.topic_description: I am looking for articles on Tengrism in Central Asia and Mongolia.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles on the ancient Turkic-Mongolian religion of Tengrism in Central Asia and Mongolia. Articles on ancient history of the region as well as on contemporary revivals of this religion are sought. Articles concerning Central Asia and Mongolia are required only to the extent that they report on Tengrism.

topics.topic_title: Xinhua News Agency's report on China-India border conflict
topics.topic_description: I am interested in articles that carry Xinhua News Agencys coverage on the China-India border conflict.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that carry Xinhua News Agencys coverage on the China-India border conflict. Relevant articles should indicate that the source of stories/comments is from Xinhua News Agency, and must be about the border conflicts that had happened. Articles in which Xinhua News Agency reports are about China-India relations in general and about future trends (e.g., potential conflicts) are not considered relevant. Articles of Chinese media's coverage of the incidents without mentioning the source from Xinhua News Agency are not relevant.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for reports on extreme weather in Russia.
topics.topic_narrative: Find reports of extreme weather of any kind occurring in Russia. Extreme downpours of rain or snow, heat or cold, hurricanes or tornadoes, flooding are all of interest. For this search reports of such extreme weather phenomena occurring elsewhere in Europe or anywhere in the world are not relevant as long as they do not contain references to Russia.

topics.topic_title: Conservation measures for cultural relics of Mogao Caves in Dunhuang
topics.topic_description: I am interested in finding articles about the conservation measures and practices for cultural relics of Mogao Caves.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles about conservation measures and practices for cultural relics of Mogao Caves. Relevant articles should introduce the measures and practices at organization levels, and mention some specifics, e.g., measures of protection against climate and hazardous weather conditions, against various erosions, etc. Only actual measures and practices are of interest in this information search. Articles about individual efforts and achievements, and about the studies of conservation, including recommendations, are not relevant unless they are articles on conservation recommendations that are adopted by organizations.

topics.topic_title: Does Khamenei defend gasoline price hike
topics.topic_description: Does Iranian Supreme Leader Ali Khamenei defend the gasoline price hike in Iran.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles reporting Iranian Supreme Leader Ali Khamenei's support for raising the price of gasoline in Iran. Relevant documents must include statements indicating Khamenei's support for the price hike. Documents that focus on protests against the gasoline price hike and arrests of protesters are not relevant. Documents that only describe Khamenei's reaction to protests are not relevant. Documents that focus on the Iranian government's decision-making process are not relevant.

topics.topic_description: I am interested in finding articles that provide information about the COVID-19 vaccination rate in China.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that that provide information about the COVID-19 vaccination rate in China. Relevant articles should include information of vaccination rate at the national level (mainland only) or local level, or discussions about the vaccination rate of the country or any of its regions if no specific rates are mentioned. Articles on other issues, like information and discussions about vaccines, effectiveness of the vaccination, vaccination rate in other countries, are not considered relevant.

topics.topic_title: Playing games could effectively prevent dementia
topics.topic_description: I'm looking for articles on whether playing games could prevent or delay the onset of dementia.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that mention playing games could prevent or delay the onset of dementia. Table top games and video games are equally relevant. Relevant articles should provide examples of games being played that have shown evidance of cognitive maintanance. Relevant articles should also mention what type of cognitive activity or region of brain these games positively stimulate.

topics.topic_title: Internet cut off during the anti-government protests in November 2019 in Iran
topics.topic_description: I am looking for the cause and implications of Iran Internet cutting off during the anti-government protests in November 2019.
topics.topic_narrative: Find relevant documents that state the purpose of cutting off the Internet in November 2019 in Iran, how long it was cut off, and if there were any consequences. Also any documents that mention to the amount of financial damage to the people besides economic damage to the government. Who or which government agency ordered the Internet cut off? How could Iran manage to cut off the global internet? Is the internet killer switch only for Iran? What was the international reaction to the Internet outage?

topics.topic_description: I am looking for articles that cover Iranian-Azerbaijani economic and trade relations.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that cover Iranian-Azerbaijani economic and trade relations, especially if they have details such as infrastructure development, funding, business exchanges, receiving delegations representing various sectors, and more. Include any commentary from Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev about economic or trade relations with his Iranian counterparts. Do not include articles on foreign affairs or military relations between the two countries. Do no include the Nagorno-Karabakh conflict.

topics.topic_title: China's local standards in its standard system
topics.topic_description: I am interested in finding articles that have information about China's local standards in the country's standards system.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles about China's local standards in the country's standards system. Relevant articles should mention specific standard(s) or the industries that they are established for, that are regional, such as a province. Articles of general discussions on local standards, without mentioning any specific standards, are not considered relevant.

topics.topic_description: I am interested in finding articles that introduce vegetables high in calcium.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that introduce vegetables high in calcium. Relevant articles should specify specific vegetables by name, and mention they are high in calcium. Grains and beans are not relevant. Animal products are not relevant.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for articles that describe the likelihood of self-driving vehicles being involved in traffic accidents.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that describe accidents invovling self-driving cars. Articles should mention either specific instances of self-driving car accidents or accident rates for self-driving cars. Aricles that only mention the potential for self-driving cars to reduce accidents without mention statistics or cases should not be included.

topics.topic_title: Did Boeing hide the faults of the 737 Max aircraft
topics.topic_description: Did Boeing hide the faults of the 737 Max aircraft that caused two aircraft to crash in Indonesia and Ethiopia?
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that indicate that the Boeing company hid the faults of the Boeing 737 Max aircraft that caused two of the 737 Max aircraft to crash in Indonesia and Ethiopia. Relevant articles clearly state that Boeing hid the aircrafts design flaws, and that these flaws led to the two crashes. Documents that only mention that Boeing concealed information about the aircraft's design flaws, but that have a different focus, such as prosecuting Boeing or lifting the grounding of the Boeing 737 Max, are not relevant.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for articles that talk about aging population in Shanghai.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles about ageing population in Shanghai. Relevant articles should address the issue of aging population specifically of the city, from any perspectives, including relevant statistics, challenges brought about by an ageing population, studies from the perspectives of the economy, public policies, etc. Articles about ageing population in the country in general or in other cities are not relevant. Articles that cover the lives of elderly people from the perspectives of healthcare, food, etc. are not relevant.

topics.topic_title: The impact of climate change on the living environment of polar bears
topics.topic_description: I am interested in articles that cover the impact of climate change on the living environment of polar bears.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that talk about the impact of climate change on the living environment of polar bears. Relevant articles should specify the specific influence of climate change on polar bears, regarding the environment of the regions they live in and the food chains for polar bears. Impacts of other factors, like the increase of tourists to the regions, industrial pollutions, etc., are not relevant.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for reports, facts, analyzes and government responses regarding honor killings and taboos of the patriarchal society in Iran.
topics.topic_narrative: Find sources that show if there are accurate statistics on honor killings in the country. Also, the names of the known victims of honor killings in Iran who have provoked a lot of reactions in the last few years, and in which areas of Iran honor killings occur the most. What makes some people in a nation have a positive attitude towards honor killings by family members? What is the Islamic Penal Code in Iran for honor killing by a father and is the punishment for child murder a deterrent? Why does the government and the welfare organization or the organization of the psychological system cover up the so-called honor killings? Is there an institution to support victims of honor killings who are often threatened with death?

topics.topic_title: The so-called "Arab Shield" military exercise in Egypt
topics.topic_description: I am looking for articles with details about the military exercise called "Arab Shield" in Egypt and its purpose.
topics.topic_narrative: Find relevant articles that show the purpose of the military exercise called "Arab Shield" in Egypt and which countries participated in this maneuver. Relevant information includes which area in Egypt was this maneuver held and for how many days. How many stages did the  maneuver have?

topics.topic_title: DNA proof of Native American - Siberian connections
topics.topic_description: I am looking for articles on DNA proving the connection between Native Americans and Siberian peoples.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that mention DNA showing the connection between Native Americans and Siberian peoples. The articles should specifically mention DNA and not just the theories of how Siberians came to the Western Hemisphere. Articles on studies of DNA of Native American remains are required only if they explicitly mention the connection to Siberian peoples.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for articles on  Post-Cold-War Development of Russian tanks.
topics.topic_narrative: Since the end of the Cold War and the reunification of Germany, there have been major changes in the political, economic, and military relations between Germany and Russia. One area that used to be of particular interest was tank development. I would like to see what improvements there have been in Russian tanks over the last 30 years.

topics.topic_description: I'm looking for tornado reports in Alabama.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles on tornado occurred in Alabama. Tornado warnings do not count. Relevant articles should specify the time and location of the tornado occured. Articles should also describe the property demage and or cost of lives caused by the tornado. Relevant documents should also mention the status of any ongoing rescue effort.

topics.topic_description: I am looking for articles on researching zones in the Ocean that are devoid of oxygen and life.
topics.topic_narrative: Dead zones in the ocean are typically created when too much nitrogen, usually from fertilizer runoff, enters the ocean and displaces the oxygen in the water. These areas are devoid of life: no fish, no animal life at all. I would like to find information on these zones and how they are being managed.

topics.topic_description: I'm looking for articles on Coca Cola's operation in India. I'm interested in both positive and negative reportings.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles reporting on Coca Cola's operational strength and or challenges in the Indian market. Relevant articles should specify if Coca Cola is gaining market share in the Indian market, and by how much. Alternatively, articles should point out any allegation, competitor, or operational challenge Coca Cola is facing.

topics.topic_title: Illegal gold mining along the Amazon River
topics.topic_description: I'm looking for articles reporting the illegal gold mining along the Amazon River.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles reporting the illegal gold mining along the Amazon river. Relevant articles should indicate how illegal gold mining were brought to light or detected. Relevant articles should also point out how these illegal activities negatively impact the Amazon river. Any articles that link the widespread deforrestation and or ecological pollution to the illegal gold mining are of particular of interest to this search.

topics.topic_description: I'm looking for articles that describe how transgender people are treated in Russia.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that reveal how transgender people are treated in Russia, whether by the public or government officials. Find stories about how transgender people are treated in terms of employment, by the police, or in a private capacity. Commentary on transgender issues from Russian journalists are relevant. Stories about transgender people in other countries or on the international arena are not relevant, even if reported by Russian media, particularly if these stories do not raise any problems faced by transgender people.

topics.topic_title: Arbitrary detention of foreigners and Iranian dual nationals by Iran
topics.topic_description: I'm looking for articles reporting on the arbitrary detention of foreigners and Iranian dual nationals by Iran.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that show whether the arbitrary detention of foreign nationals and dual nationals by Iran is for political or economic gain or whether they are allegedly spies for Iran. What is the reaction of governments and international institutions? Is this a government hostage-taking?

topics.topic_description: I'm looking for articles that discuss Iran's indigenous production of CovIran Barekat Covid vaccine.
topics.topic_narrative: Find information about CovIran Barekat vaccine production in Iran. Relevant documents must include the number of doses of Barekat that have been produced, estimates of future Barekat vaccine production, or data about the effectiveness of the Barekat vaccine. Documents that report about the importation of vaccines; pricing of the Barekat vaccine; registering the Barekat vaccine with the World Health Organization; or obtaining emergency authorization to use the Barekat vaccine, are not relevant.

topics.topic_description: I'm looking for articles describing NASA's first helicopter flight on Mars.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles that describe the successful first, historical flight of NASAs Mars helicopter Ingenuity. Relevant articles explain why this helicopter flight was a significant historical event. Documents that report about the helicopter flight before it occurred are not relevant. Documents that report on subsequent flights of the helicopter are not relevant, even if the first flight is mentioned.

topics.topic_description: I'm looking for articles on whale stranding.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles on whale stranding. Relevant articles should provide the number of whales stranded on the beach, death count if any, and the count of whales successfully rescued by helping them return to the water. Relevant articles should also provide possible cause of such phenomenon.

topics.topic_description: I'm interested in articles reporting the rollout of digital Yuan, and any potential shift or impact on the US dollar.
topics.topic_narrative: Find articles reporting the rollout of digital Yuan by the China Central Bank. Relevant articles should provide where and when the digital currency was introduced to the Chinese public. Relevant articles should also discuss the potential impact from the digital Yuan on the US Dollar and its world reserve status.
